text: Futhi nguyena owadala amazulu nomhlaba ngezinsuku eziyisithupha futhi isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi sasingaphezu kwamanzi ukuze anivivinye ukuthi ngubani phakathi kwenu onezenzo ezinhle ngokwedlulele kepha uma wawungase uthi ngempela nina niyovuswa emva kokufa ukuze labo abangakholwanga bathi “lokhu akuyi1utho ngaphandle kokuthi kungumlingo ogqamile.”
